title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing Nitro Isolation Engine: Transparency through Mathematics (CMP359)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍 Nitro 隔离引擎：通过数学实现透明性 (CMP359)
abstract: The AWS Nitro System revolutionized cloud computing by providing always-on confidential computing, ensuring AWS has zero operator access to customer data. While AWS offers various ways to assure this protection, today we are introducing Nitro Isolation Engine as an enhancement to the Nitro System. Nitro Isolation Engine harnesses formal verification to provide mathematical certainty that customer workloads are isolated from each other and AWS operators, pioneering a new standard for  mathematically proven cloud security. Join this session to learn from our engineers how the Nitro Isolation Engine was designed and implemented for formal verification to enhance customer trust in the security of the Nitro System.
abstract_cn: AWS Nitro System通过提供始终在线的机密计算，确保AWS对客户数据零操作员访问权限，从而彻底改变了云计算。虽然AWS提供了多种方式来保证这种保护，但今天我们推出Nitro Isolation Engine作为Nitro System的增强功能。Nitro Isolation Engine利用形式化验证提供数学确定性，证明客户工作负载彼此隔离且与AWS操作员隔离，开创了数学证明云安全的新标准。加入本次会议，了解我们的工程师如何设计和实现Nitro Isolation Engine的形式化验证，以增强客户对Nitro System安全性的信任。
